name: Internal Invasion - a physics game for mobile devices
blurb: Guide little Ro'bert through dozens of levels with a touch of your finger. Internal Invasion packs a lot of charm, challenge, and fun!

rewards.reward:
1) THE GAME
==============================
Download your copy of Internal Invasion from Apple, Google Play, or Windows 8 stores.

YOU'LL ALSO GET YOUR NAME IN THE CREDITS!

EARLY BIRDS\r\n==============================\r\nFor a limited time only! Those who get in quick will have the opportunity to gain access to the early access forum as well as the game for just \u00a31!

2) EARLY ACCESS\r\n==============================\r\nYou'll get to play the game immediately through your web-browser, as well as gain access to a private forum to share your thoughts and ideas on the game so far. You'll also get a copy of the game on release, PLUS your name in the beta-tester section of the credits!
3) ART LOVERS\r\n==============================\r\nYou'll get reward 2, PLUS a selection of high resolution images for use as wallpapers, or even just staring at for pure pleasure!

4) MUSIC LOVERS\r\n==============================\r\nLike a little bit of music, hey? I don't blame you! Pick this reward, and not only will you get rewards 2-3, but you'll also pick up the awesome DRM-free soundtrack! You lucky devil you!

5) EXECUTIVE TESTER
==============================
You'll get rewards 2-4, as well as an invitation to play a few games over voice chat while we discuss Internal Invasion. You'll also snap up the credit of "Executive Tester".

*Note, this is a special limited reward, and is not included with other rewards.

6) POSTER LOVER\r\n==============================\r\nDo you like the feel of a gloss paper between your fingertips? How about if that poster was of a loveable little robot? I thought so! Then this reward is for you! On top of this, you'll of course get rewards 2-4.

7) LIMITED - POSTER DESIGNER
==============================
Are you one of those creative types? Fancy trying your hand at designing your own poster? Send us a sketch or a detailed explanation of what you want Ro'bert to be doing in your poster, and leave it to us! We'll also add the digital artwork to the package, and oh why not... while we're here, we'll throw in rewards 2-6!

*Note, this is a special limited reward, and is not included with other rewards.

8) HOW'D YOU DO THAT?
==============================
Pledge £20 and get a special 'Making of' video, showing the final few months of development, as well as a few inside hints and tips on what to do, and what mistakes to try to avoid.

Includes rewards 2-6!

9) T-SHIRT LOVER
==============================
Don't you just love T-Shirts? They just make you all warm and awesome looking, don't they? What's that? You can get an Internal Invasion T-Shirt? Wow, you just made my day!

You'll also get rewards 2-8, so feel even better about yourself!

10) LEVEL DESIGNER
==============================
Wanted: Awesome level designer for awesome game!

Step up to the mark, and show the world what you're capable of. We'll work with you, one on one to see that your level will be designed just the way you want it, and included in the game under the 'bonus' section. We'll also see to it that your name will be displayed alongside the level selection.

Includes rewards 2-9

11) SUPER LIMITED - MUSIC MAKER
==============================
Are you a world famous musician? Maybe you're just super talented! Either way, if you've got the skills, we want to hear it! We'll include your track as the background music in the bonus menu of Internal Invasion.

*IMPORTANT - MUSIC MUST NOT INCLUDE VOCALS.

We'll add your name and track to the credits, as well as another line of your choice.

Includes rewards 2-10!

*Note, this is a special limited reward, and is not included with other rewards.

12) SUPER LIMITED - YOU THE BOSS
==============================
Not content with designing your own level? How about designing your own boss level? Sound exciting? Well pick your jaw up from the floor, it's true! You get to help design its appearance, as well as how to defeat it!

Dream come true? Well, you're welcome!

On top of that, you'll have our eternal thanks, as well as rewards 2-10! We'll also throw in a T-Shirt of your boss character in addition to reward 10!

*Note, this is a special limited reward, and is not included with other rewards.

13) ASPIRING DEVELOPER
==============================
Feel like making your own version of Internal Invasion? We'll send you all the images, SPRITES, artwork, 3D models, music and sound effects (Currently over 1gb of data) and let you do what you want with them! Feel like making Internal Invasion 2? Well if you've got the ability, you've also got the content necessary!

Includes rewards 2-10!

14) FULL ON DEVELOPER\r\n==============================\r\nYou want it? You got it! This reward snags you the code behind the game, as well as rewards 2-13, meaning you can make changes to the original game itself. Want to add more levels, change the ones already in place, or just want an idea of how the game was made? This reward's for you!

15) PRIVATE TUITION
==============================
You'll get a private lesson in the software used to make Internal Invasion, Construct 2. Using the resources you'll gain from rewards 13 and 14, we'll take the steps necessary to help you make a mini-game based on the Internal Invasion mechanics.

Take your first steps into becoming a developer yourself!

We'll also see to it that you get access to rewards 2 -14, as well as a special T-Shirt as our way of saying thanks, AND... a special mention in the credits as an "EPIC BACKER"!

16) COLLECTOR\r\n==============================\r\nFor the collectors out there! This is the big one! You'll pick up the credit as 'Producer', receive all available previous rewards, as well as REWARD 5. On top of everything else, you'll receive a 3D printed model of Ro'bert and his cannon. I'll also make an extra special video to thank you personally.
